{"title": "iRepton", "title_search": "irepton", "title_keyword": "irepton", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/irepton/", "summary": "ADDICTIVE. CHARMING. CHALLENGING. A RETRO CLASSIC! Selling over a 125,000 copies since first released back in the 80's for the BBC B Microcomputer.  ___________________________________   NEWS: The new update adds Openfeint support (leaderboards, achievements etc), a new control method (D-Pad) and many other features and little tweaks!  ___________________________________   Repton is a lizard that crawls around in an underground maze in a quest to collect diamonds by moving earth, pushing rocks and avoiding monsters! With enhanced graphics and sound, iRepton introduces this classic game to a new generation on the iPhone and iPod Touch. DIAMONDS: Collect all the diamonds on a level as fast as you can before the time runs out!  MONSTERS: Monsters emerge from cracked eggs - Avoid being caught or kill them with rocks!  KEYS / SAFES: Find keys to unlock safes and open up new areas of a level, but watch out, they might start a landslide of rocks or release a monster!  MAP: Check the map at anytime to view your progress through a level or to give you some helpful pointers of where to go next when trying to solve that tricky puzzle! {"title": "The Stone of Destiny HD", "title_search": "the stone of destiny hd", "title_keyword": "the stone of destiny hd", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/the-stone-of-destiny-hd/", "summary": "“The Stone of Destiny HD” – the first hidden object game for iPhone - now arrives to iPad! As you might expect, the iPad is an ideal venue for this kind of game, providing ease of use through the high-res graphics and the touchscreen.    Fancy yourself an Indiana Jones type of adventurer, finding valuable hidden treasures that others have unsuccessfully searched for?  Maybe a good, old fashioned mystery is just the ticket for you.   “The Stone of Destiny” has something for every adventurous spirit in search of intrigue.  Explore the foreboding ruins of mystic temples and libraries or investigate the ancient altar where a precious object may be cleverly hidden. You never know where objects may be found, you’ll have to keep an open mind and be thorough. The yellowed map of the world may even lead you to the briny depths in search a long forgotten shipwreck.   Every level you are given the list of objects to find. Sometimes instead of looking for items by their names, you seek them by their silhouettes. After clearing each set of locations, you pass through a portal that leads you further down the path to the Stone. Each portal presents you with 3D puzzles such as moving sarcophagi, placing rocks into their respective pillars, rearranging symbols and exclusive rune-drawing between levels.    You’ll love the beautiful, high resolution graphics and ease of playing that this app offers.  If you can tap a screen, you can interact with it. Generally, "The Stone of Destiny HD" gives players the feel of participating in old-school adventures like in Indiana Jones movies.      What critics said about iPhone version:   “…it features lavish visuals and unique gameplay”. (Toucharcade.com)  “The game is all fun; play it fair if you want the fun and excitement to last longer” (iPhonefootprint.com)   “Attention to detail and mindful design have resulted in a beautifully crafted game. The Stone of Destiny feels complete and cohesive, boasting colorful scenes and finely tuned gameplay”. (Pocketgamer.co.uk) + Gold Award  “There isn’t much that you could criticize Stone of Destiny for; it’s a sturdy title and good example of its genre, making it one of the more tranquil games currently available on iPhone”. (Darkzero.co.uk)    Meet also “Cassandra’s Journey: The Legacy of Nostradamus HD” – fascinating adventure quest for iPad.", "genre": ["Adventure"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2010-03-31", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-148530-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-148530-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Avallon Alliance Ltd. Picross HD (also commonly known as Nonograms, Griddlers or Paint by Numbers) is a logic puzzle in which squares in a grid are filled in to match numeric clues that appear beside the grid.  Completion of the puzzle results in a satisfying picture formed by the filled squares.   Rules:   1. Each set of numeric clue describes a recipe for filling squares in a row or column of the grid.    2. Each number in a recipe represents a string of continuous, filled-in squares.   3. Between each string there is at least one empty square.   4. Row clues are to the left of the grid, column clues are above.  Satisfy all row and column clues and you've solved the puzzle.   Trust us, it's much harder to describe in words then it is too play, give it a try.    Picross HD contains 42 puzzles and we have plans to release additional puzzle packs in the very near future.  We hope that you thoroughly enjoy this puzzle and we're eager to hear from you.  If you have issues or suggestions to improve Picross HD please let us know - you feedback is much appreciated.   We also very much appreciate your positive customer ratings and reviews.
